name: Alien Survival (Jairo11711)
description:
See how long can you survive in the night.

Created for the Godot Wild Jam #51: UPGRADES

Survive as long as you can and kill aliens to get rewards from your research center.

Arrow Keys to move

Press X to to interact (The research building, spawned turrets, lightsource)

Press C to to shoot aliens

Note: Just be pointed to the general direction of the enemy to shoot.

My original vision for the game was you slowly upgrading your base against an onslaught of enemies who is evolving with you.

Alas I have to drastically reduce the scope since this is my first game ever released.
